dev.marksman.kraftwerk.weights

Class TernaryWeights

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.marksman.kraftwerk.weights.TernaryWeights

  • public final class TernaryWeights
extends java.lang.Object
    A triple of weights that express the frequencies of three possible outcomes in the context of generating values.

    Any of the three weights can be zero; however, the sum of the weights will always be >= 1.

      • ternaryWeights

        public static TernaryWeights ternaryWeights(int weightA,
                                            int weightB,
                                            int weightC)
        Creates a TernaryWeights. The sum of the weights for all choices must be >= 1.
        Parameters:
        weightA - the weight for choice A; must be >= 0
        weightB - the weight for choice B; must be >= 0
        weightC - the weight for choice C; must be >= 0
        Returns:
        a TernaryWeights
